story: At DODGEBALL 70 (Dec 30, 2006), 'Be My Lover' filled the speakers; Stopa immediately took to the court with a glowing smile exclaiming 'I love this song!' Fellow 2011 ECDElite Hall of Fame classmate.

Introduced by Rob 'Rupert' Knott, one of the first times with Jake was near a computer. He replayed the live version of 'Emotions' over a dozen times. A personal revival in Mariah Carey's music commenced.
Anyone attending the 2008-2009 series of Joe Corcione-hosted karaoke events were in for a wild three-minute ride. He never failed to impress his audience. Nicknamed 'Giuseppe NJ.'

The Falcon Years (1998-2002). Val's verbal admiration for this song, especially en route to graduation, remain etched in memory. Origin of their friendship came before either attended a WrestleMania. 6x WM attendee.
Featured on 'Crazy One' Edwards' MySpace page. The melody reminds of Mike's laid-back personality while the lyrics are hard-hitting stunners much like his presence during any athletic contest.

During a pre-dodgeball meal at MarinaGrille off Route 70 in Brick, KMJ became the 3rd person to find out. Once the check was paid, the car radio played 'Say' with its perfect chorus. 'I said exactly what I needed to say; now I look back with a smile.'
